entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
